desc.cn: Argo Rollouts 是一个 Kubernetes 控制器和一组 CRD，为 Kubernetes 提供高级部署功能，例如  blue-green, canary, canary analysis,实验和渐进式交付功能
desc.en: Argo Rollouts is a Kubernetes controller and set of CRDs which provide advanced deployment capabilities such as blue-green, canary, canary analysis, experimentation, and progressive delivery features to Kubernetes
